prompts: Create a legendary dragon Pokemon with dark armor and glowing eyes in a stormy landscape.
Imagine a powerful electric-type Pokemon with a sleek aerodynamic design and intimidating wings.
Design a mythical creature with a striking black body and blue accents, soaring through the night sky.
Generate a massive dragon-like Pokemon that embodies the essence of thunder and lightning.
Show me a unique Pokemon that has a fearsome appearance and radiates electric energy.
Give me a bipedal Pokemon that commands the skies with its majestic wings and dark aura.
Make a Pokemon that combines the traits of a dragon and a storm, with striking visual effects.

distinctive_features: Jagged edges on wings and body
